Title: Operation: Broken Feather
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Daniel J. Goor, Michael Schur, Gil Ozeri (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake is hurt when Amy tells him that she is considering leaving the precinct, while Terry helps Holt redesign the precinct to make everyone more productive.
